title: Ticket #2973: Standard universe may never checkpoint when nscd isn't running
description: On Debian 6 and RHEL6, if nscd isn't running, the glibc used in standard universe leaves an unconnected socket open. This causes the checkpoint library to always defer checkpointing (until the socket is closed, which won't happen).
derived_tickets: #2975   Add test to verify that we can checkpoint without nscd running.
